```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Import some data 

I want to import 'FAS_litters.csv'.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

pups_df = read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv")
pups_df = janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```

## Select 

Let's select some columns. 

```{r}
select(litters_df, group, litter_number)
select(litters_df, group, gd0_weight, gd18_weight)

select(litters_df, group, gd0_weight:gd_of_birth)
select(litters_df, group, starts_with("pups"))

# to eliminate columns 
select(litters_df, -litter_number)

# to select a column and rename it 
select(litters_df, GROUP = group, litter_number)

# rename function
rename(litters_df, GROUP = group)

# rearranging columns 
select(litters_df, litter_number, everything())

relocate(litters_df, litter_number, pups_survive)

select(pups_df, litter_number, sex, pd_ears)

# pull function
# pull(litters_df, group)
```
